title: 203 - Could Apple Still Be Undervalued? (Investing City)
description: Apple is worth $1 Trillion, but is it actually worth more? Investing city thinks it could be. (Note: This interview was recorded prior to Apple's recent earnings and therefore market cap numbers will reflect older numbers. The valuation process and findings still hold true.)
